Articles.Content: I was not plying ksp long time, because i work on my Library Science MA thesis, when i play KSP last time it was January, i have some free time now so decided to play KSP, I thought it would be 0.24 or even 0.25 but no still 0.23.
Apparently sometime in April. Some serious bugs popped up, which require squashing, which in turn pushed back release date.
Hi, Pawelk. 0.24 is still under development with no date set yet. Thanks.
